A copy of the license agreement is provided in the file named "LICENSE.txt" included with this software distribution and also available online as http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0-standalone.html. --------------------------------------------------------------------- Version: $Rev$
This configuration provides locale-dependent names to be displayed when launching an application.
Note that String arrays can be stored by enclosing the Strings in square brackets and using the semicolon as separator between the items.
properties.entry: Could not initialize graphical user interface.
No graphical user interface supported for {0} version {1}.
Incomplete list of command-line arguments. Try to restart {0} version {1} with the --help option
